panels.title: API Server CPU usage in CPU Seconds

panels.description: Using recording rules via kube stack prometheus
panels.title: Slowest Requests (P90) - 5min

targets.expr: sum by(resource, code, verb, system_client) (irate(apiserver_request_total{job="apiserver", system_client!=""}[5m]))

panels.title: OVN Node Pod Detailed Mem Usage

panels.description: All Calls Heatmap to etcd server. Show etcd high level  if etcd is source of slowness. Adding a recording rule will help.
panels.title: Etcd Request Latency

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by(pod, container, namespace, name, service) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!="POD", name!="", node=~"$_master_node", namespace!="", namespace=~"$namespace"}[1m]))) * 100
